tech_stack: React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Google Cloud Vision API
title: Oniva

body.subtitle: Project Overview ðŸ“‹
body.body: Oniva is a omnichannel-integrated product discovery webpage for Arc'teryx that accesses and suggests catalog items via Arc'teryx product API. The primary function of the app is to suggest personalized hiking trails. It uses Google Cloud Vision API to extract the user's current outfit, allowing users to upload photos of what they're wearing and receive relevant outerwear recommendations and scorings. The webpage is designed to focus on enhancing the shopping experience for Arc'teryx customers.
